doc:
Robert Broyles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Broyles 0 Robert Houston Broyles (January 20, 1933 - February 12, 2011) was an American character actor, drama teacher, theatre director, and writer. He was sometimes billed as Bob Broyles or Bobby Broyles. Robert_Houston_Broyles ( January_20_,_1933 - February_12_,_2011 ) was an_American_character_actor , drama_teacher , theatre_director , and writer . He was_sometimes_billed as Bob_Broyles or Bobby_Broyles .
